sources.title: 1936 - Don't Turn 'em Loose - Drama Criminal - Benjamin Stoloff - VO
sources.description: For Academic - Educational Use Only https://derechonoir.wordpress.com/

metadata.Plot: A conscientious attorney who is a member of the State Parole Board, finds his own son, using an alias, up for parole and makes the decision to cast the approving vote. This turns out to cause many problems for the family while on vacation, and the father has to make another hard decision.
metadata.Writer: Harry Segall, Thomas Walsh, Ferdinand Reyher
metadata.Actors: Lewis Stone, James Gleason, Bruce Cabot
